entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is tightly wrapped around Lavender and whose voice tailed away in mutters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who tries to talk to Hermione properly in the evenings.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one whose timetable is full and who refuses to sit in the common room while Ron is there.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as the one whom Ron is tightly wrapped around.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned in Ron's mutters.

entities.name: madam pince
entities.description: Madam Pince is mentioned as the librarian who prowls the shelves behind Hermione and Harry.

entities.name: common room
entities.description: The common room is mentioned as a place where Hermione refuses to sit while Ron is there.

entities.name: library
entities.description: The library is mentioned as a place where Harry and Hermione have their conversations in whispers.

relationships.description: Ron is tightly wrapped around Lavender, indicating that they are involved with each other.
Harry tries to talk to Hermione properly in the evenings.
